## \_\_usePosition() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Please see the new hook 
> 

Hook used to call the specified callback with the element position

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function usePosition(ref: React.RefObject<HTMLElement>, callback: PositionCallback, config?: PositionConfig, deps?: unknown[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | React.RefObject&lt;HTMLElement&gt; | The React Ref of the element to be watched |
|  callback | PositionCallback | Callback |
|  config | [PositionConfig](./useposition.positionconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Behavior config. |
|  deps | unknown\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Whenever this dependencies changes the callback is called |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
